page.title: 14Tourism in Bwlchysarnau
page.content: Mid Wales as a whole is a neglected area for tourism and Bwlchysarnau is no exception. There is one bed and breakfast establishment and a small Caravan Club campsite. There are no second 'holiday homes'. Many holiday makers pass through the area either by car, on rambles or on a cycle tour. The long distance footpath Glyndwr's Way winds its way through Bwlchysarnau, and though not heavily used, there are often walkers stopping and enquiring about the nearest shop, pub or campsite! It is an ideal area for walking or bird watching but most of the footpaths are not signposted or well defined so an ordnance survey map is a necessity.
